remarks: The degree of a composition of two polynomials is the product of the degrees.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 15-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dgrco.1 $e |- M = ( deg ` F ) $.
dgrco.2 $e |- N = ( deg ` G ) $.
dgrco.3 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
dgrco.4 $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) $.
dgrco $p |- ( ph -> ( deg ` ( F o. G ) ) = ( M x. N ) ) $.
